Package game

Class FoodItem

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
game.PortableItem
game.FoodItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ItemInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
DinoCorpse, Egg, Fish, Fruit, MealKit
public abstract class FoodItem
extends PortableItem
the general class for all the food items that will inherit it, all food items are portable and will have a value that they can heal actors for.
